name: Site Home extension for Opera
body:
## Site home

Site Home is an Opera port of a Safari extension that adds a toolbar button designed to take you to the current website’s start (aka. home) page. Original [Safari extension](http://deepitpro.com/en/articles/SiteHome/info/) by _Deep Informational Technologies._

Download the [Site Home extension](https://addons.opera.com/extensions/details/site-home/) from Opera’s extension catalog.

The extension will override the Open History Panel keyboard shortcut (Windows only), Control–h, for it’s own purposes. Supported on all platforms.

Get the MIT licenses [source code on GitHub.](https://github.com/zcode/site-home)
tagline: An Opera extension that offers to take you to any website’s home page from a toolbar button
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
